definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: In many classrooms, Perry might simply have been regarded as a  troublemaker.
sentences.chinese: 在很多課堂上，佩裏可能都被認爲是個搗蛋鬼。

sentences.english: The planets are being little gremlins this month, dear Aries.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的白羊們，這個月的行星有點像小搗蛋鬼。

sentences.english: The old man blew up to those naughty boys who had disarrayed his corp.
sentences.chinese: 那個老人對那些弄亂他莊稼的搗蛋鬼。

sentences.english: But there are some rascals making lif difficult for Santa Claus.
sentences.chinese: 但有一些搗蛋鬼故意爲聖誕老人制造麻煩。

sentences.english: Behavior or character typical of a rascal.
sentences.chinese: 無賴行爲流氓，惡棍，搗蛋鬼的行爲或特點。

sentences.english: Steven was a black sheep and often made trouble in class.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂芬是班上唯一一個搗蛋鬼，經常擾亂課堂秩序。

sentences.english: I fear the gremlins that have colonized my brain.
sentences.chinese: 我怕已向我的腦袋殖民的搗蛋鬼。

definition: child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: to scoop the best camera shots/to grab the limelight
